backend.stack: Node.js | TypeScript | Fastify | Express | Next.js | Prisma ORM | Jest | Swagger
activities: Maintenance and evolution of internal APIs and support for a real estate after-sales app with financial management and construction tracking.
Back-end support for more than 40 RESTful endpoints using Fastify, ensuring security and performance.
Development of critical APIs with TypeScript and Prisma ORM, following scalability standards and documentation with Swagger.
Integration of the application with Grafana and Loki for centralized monitoring and analysis of Fastify server logs.
Optimized API response time by 20% through targeted refactoring based on log insights.
Automated invoice sending via WhatsApp using Node.js, increasing sales team productivity by 60%.
Process modeling and automation with Fluig (BPM/BPMN), reducing manual process time by 50%.
Built a Next.js API for Google Analytics 4 integration, enabling advanced metric queries with date filters.

frontend.stack: React.js | Next.js | TypeScript | Tailwind CSS | Material-UI | RESTful APIs
activities: Development of a B2B document management platform with architecture prepared for AI implementation.
Interface evolution through creation and refinement of complex components using React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript.
Implementation of a reusable design system with Material-UI and Tailwind CSS, ensuring responsiveness and Figma prototype fidelity.
Performance optimization: reduced critical page loading time by 25% via lazy loading, image optimization, and parallel API calls.
Efficient integration with RESTful APIs in collaboration with the back-end team, increasing operational reliability.
Worked in a multidisciplinary team following Agile/Scrum methodology, with deliveries aligned to business goals.

list.title: Aparatus Barber — Barber Hall with AI
list.description: SaaS-ready platform built with Next.js 16, React 19, and Tailwind CSS 4. The project uses an AI Orchestration pipeline (MCPs such as Context7 and Figma MCP, plus Cursor Rules) to ensure clean code and high design fidelity. Offers smart scheduling via chat with Vercel AI SDK (Function Calling), automated payments and refunds via Stripe Webhooks, and robust authentication with Better Auth, all optimized with strategic caching via TanStack Query for zero latency.

list.title: BEWEAR - E-commerce
list.description: High-performance full-stack e-commerce developed with Next.js 15.4, React 19, and Tailwind CSS 4. With a Mobile-First architecture, the platform offers a product catalog with variants, synchronized cart system via TanStack Query, modern authentication via Better Auth, and secure checkout integrated with Stripe with resilient webhook processing. Drizzle ORM ensures ultra-fast queries and minimal latency throughout the purchase journey.

list.title: FSW Donalds
list.description: Modern self-service and delivery platform developed with Next.js 15.1 and React 19. Provides a complete online ordering experience, supporting multiple consumption methods (Dine-in/Takeaway) with a cart system, real-time status tracking, and CPF validation. Uses Server Actions for type-safe operations, Prisma ORM in Docker containerized environment, and secure checkout flow integrated with Stripe payment gateway.

list.title: Find Hope Hub — Missing Persons Location
list.description: A public utility platform for locating missing persons, distinguished by its robust CI/CD pipeline and professional infrastructure. The project's core strength lies in its automated quality gates via GitHub Actions, executing 12 comprehensive tests (Vitest with API mocking), ESLint 9 linting, and Prettier formatting before every release. It features a 100% dockerized architecture using pnpm v9 in resilient SPA mode, ensuring environment parity. Continuous Deployment to Render is triggered only after passing all security and quality checks, utilizing GitHub Secrets and Environments for secure sensitive data management.

list.title: Portfolio
list.description: Tech showcase developed as a high-performance SPA, exploring the full potential of the React ecosystem in 2025. Uses React Compiler and Vite 7 to ensure instant navigation and avoid unnecessary re-renders. Supported by modern data architecture with GraphQL and Apollo Client, plus an immersive interface orchestrated with Motion and Swiper 12. Every detail optimized with code splitting, prioritizing accessibility and strict mobile-first fluidity.

list.title: Fastify API — Courses Management & RBAC
list.description: High-performance RESTful API developed with Fastify 5.5 and TypeScript, using Drizzle ORM for ultra-fast data layer with PostgreSQL. Implements strict RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) distinguishing 'student' and 'manager', secured with JWT authentication and Argon2 encryption. Reliability ensured through integration testing pipeline with Vitest and isolated Docker environments, plus automated documentation via Swagger/Scalar UI.

list.title: Money — Mobile Financial Management
list.description: Native app for personal finance management, mastering the React Native ecosystem (Expo SDK 53). Uses Expo Router v4 for file-based navigation and offline local data persistence with AsyncStorage. Focused on refined UX through haptic feedback, smooth animations with Reanimated 3, advanced keyboard handling, and native date pickers, ensuring a responsive and intuitive interface for the end user.

list.title: MoniForest — Geographic Monitoring
list.description: Geographic intelligence platform (GIS) developed with React 19 and Tailwind CSS 4.1 for real-time asset monitoring. Uses Leaflet for geospatial processing, enabling fleet management with productivity indicators, operational status, and event timeline. Architecture transforms lat/long coordinates into critical visual insights, leveraging Vite 6 for high performance in interactive map layer rendering.

list.title: AuthSystem (Front-End) — JWT Authentication
list.description: Complete frontend authentication system developed with React 19 and Vite 6, focused on robust security and smooth UX. Implements end-to-end JWT flow, using Service Layer with Axios interceptors for automatic Access and Refresh token management. Architecture ensures data integrity with strict Zod validation, private route protection via React Router 7, and a responsive interface built with Tailwind CSS 4 and accessible Radix UI components.

list.title: AuthSystem APIs (Back-End) — Node.js, Express 5.1 & Swagger
list.description: High-performance RESTful API engineered with a Controller-Service-Repository architecture, ensuring total separation of concerns and scalability. The ecosystem is fully containerized with Docker and features automated PostgreSQL orchestration. It implements an advanced security layer with JWT (Access/Refresh Tokens), BcryptJS hashing, and defensive password policies via Zod. Includes interactive Swagger UI (OpenAPI 3.0) documentation, Prisma ORM persistence, and high-speed builds with tsup, delivering a resilient and 100% type-safe backend solution.
